Notes: Mixed results: 35% R1 show positive social comparison (their willing to accept sum goes up with R2’s offers), the rest R1’s are indifferent. 25% R2’s (R2 outside options > R1 outside options) show positive slope with comparison; 25% are indifferent; 50% show negative slope of comparison (R2’s willing to ask goes up as R1’s offers decrease)
Fairness is calculated, but from an egocentric perspectives.
Proposers dont seem to change their offers significantly from baseline round to comparison round
